snippet: New York State gun owners are desperately trying to head off restrictions that they do not believe will prevent gun violence.
abstract: New York State gun owners, like  Harold W Schroeder, are trying to head off Gov Andrew Cuomo's new package of tough gun laws, restrictions they do not believe will prevent gun violence; Schroeder, retired park superintendent who teaches gun-safety instruction,  says he is as outraged as rest of the country over shootings like Newtown, Conn, massacre but feels gun owners are now being demonized.
lead_paragraph: New York State gun owners are desperately trying to head off restrictions that they do not believe will prevent gun violence.

headline.seo: Upstate New York Gun Owners Cast a Cold Eye on New Laws
headline.main: Upstate Gun Owners Cast a Cold Eye on Cuomo Effort
headline.print_headline:
Upstate Gun Owners Cast
A Cold Eye on Cuomo Effort
